changes: Relocated 'bed_1' from the proposed north-east corner to the south-east corner. The original proposal violated the CRITICAL rule to place the bed in a corner furthest from the door. The new position correctly de-emphasizes the bed and keeps it out of the initial line of sight from the entrance.
Relocated 'nightstand_1' and 'nightstand_2' to flank 'bed_1' in its new, correct position.
Relocated 'artwork_2' to be above the headboard of 'bed_1'. The original instruction was impossible with the bed's new corner placement.
Relocated 'plant_1' from the south-east corner to the north-east corner. Its original proposed location conflicted with the new, correct placement of the bed.

Consolidated 'rug_1' and 'rug_2' into a single 'rug_1'. Using two small rugs under a desk is impractical for chair movement. A single area rug better defines the 'HERO' workspace, as required by the 'Productivity Focus' style. 'rug_2' has been removed.
Clarified the instruction for 'table_1' to specify its function as a desk, reinforcing the 'Productivity Focus' style goal.

refined_placements.table_1: Centered on the south wall, pushed flush against it between the two windows. This serves as the primary desk and workspace.
refined_placements.chair_1: Placed at the desk (table_1) on the west side, with its back to the center of the room.
refined_placements.chair_2: Placed at the desk (table_1) on the east side, with its back to the center of the room.
refined_placements.bed_1: In the south-east corner of the room, with the headboard against the east wall. This position is furthest from the entry door and not in the direct line of sight.
refined_placements.nightstand_1: Positioned to the south of bed_1, between the head of the bed and the south wall.
refined_placements.nightstand_2: Positioned to the north of bed_1, on the other side of the bed.
refined_placements.sofa_1: Pushed flush against the west wall, positioned south of the kitchenette to keep the main walkway clear.
refined_placements.artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered above sofa_1.
refined_placements.artwork_2: Mounted on the east wall, centered above the headboard of bed_1.
refined_placements.plant_1: Placed in the north-east corner of the room, near the bathroom door, to fill the space and add visual interest without obstructing traffic.
refined_placements.rug_1: A single area rug centered on the south wall, positioned under the desk (table_1) and chairs to define the workspace.
